name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Proficient Full-Stack Software Engineer skilled in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **Python**, **React**, **AWS**, **Terraform**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, **GitHub Actions**, **Jenkins**, **REST API**, **Elixir**, **Ruby**, **Java**, and **Swift**. Adept at designing scalable, reliable, and user-centric applications, I have successfully executed complex solutions across healthcare, eCommerce, and finance sectors. My strengths include creative problem-solving, team collaboration, and attention to detail, further enriched by a self-starter mentality and strong verbal communication skills. I am dedicated to driving significant improvements through automation and robust architectures, while maintaining a commitment to clean, efficient code.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed scalable web applications using **JavaScript** and **React**, enhancing user engagement by 40% and achieving a user satisfaction score of **95%**.
Implemented RESTful APIs with **Node.js** and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring data integrity and secure transactions, which improved response times by **50%**.
Utilized **AWS** cloud services for hosting applications, maintaining a performance uptime of **99.9%** and optimizing infrastructure with **Terraform**.
Designed microservices architecture, leading to a reduction in deployment times by **80%** through the establishment of CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions**.
Integrated caching strategies using **Redis**, improving data retrieval speeds by **30%** and enhancing overall application performance.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, leveraging strong relationship-building skills and verbal communication to align project deliverables with organizational goals.
Applied problem-solving and creative thinking to innovate solutions for complex technical challenges, resulting in a *smoother user experience* and a *reduction in support queries*.

Utilized **Java** (Spring Boot) and **Node.js** to develop robust backend services, achieving a **25%** reduction in response times for ticketing and customer support.
Engineered a high-performance notification system with **Kafka** for real-time alerts, resulting in a **98%** on-time notification rate for critical issues.
Designed and implemented a customer insights dashboard with **Vue.js** and **D3.js**, enhancing resolution rates by **20%**.
Automated testing and deployment processes using **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, establishing a reliable and consistent release strategy.
Deployed the application on **AWS EC2** utilizing **Docker** and **Terraform**, decreasing infrastructure setup time by **50%**.
Enhanced collaboration and problem-solving within team projects through effective communication and relationship building.
Showcased attention to detail and creative thinking in technical writing and documentation.

- Developed backend REST APIs using **Java (Spring Boot)**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Hibernate**, achieving **98% uptime**.
- Implemented the frontend using **Angular** and **TypeScript**, improving load times by **40%**.
- Led testing initiatives with **JUnit** and **Mockito**, reducing bugs by **30%** through effective **problem-solving** and **attention to detail**.
- Optimized frontend performance through strategies like lazy loading and code splitting, resulting in improved load times.
- Deployed solutions globally with **AWS CloudFront** and **S3**, ensuring low-latency access and maximizing performance.
- Engaged in **team collaboration**, bringing creative thinking to enhance application features and user experience.
